p: The viruses for which LAMP has not been developed till now are as follows: equine arteritis virus, simian hemorrhagic fever virus, tick-borne encephalitis virus, bornavirus, infectious bovine rhinotracheitis virus, feline herpesvirus, bovine respiratory syncytial virus, bovine rhinotracheitis virus, equine anemia virus, cowpox virus, elephant endotheliotropic herpesvirus, turkeypox virus, myxomatosis virus, menangle virus, rabbit hemorrhagic disease virus, and rabbit hemorrhagic virus.
